## MutationsOptionType type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MutationsOptionType<StateOption extends StateOptionType, GettersOption extends GettersOptionType<StateOption>> = Record<Key, Exclude<({ state, getters, mutations, }: {
    state: StateOption;
    getters: DeepReadonly<{
        [P in keyof GettersOption]: ReturnType<GettersOption[P]>;
    }>;
    mutations: any;
}, ...payload: Payload[]) => void, AsyncFunc>>;
```
